item.title: Grand Millennium Hotel Dubai introduces special Eid packages
item.description:
The Grand Millennium Hotel Dubai has revealed its plans for a lavish Eid celebration, including a grand feast and special offers throughout the holiday. The Atrium restaurant will host an Eid Lunch Buffet, priced at AED150 per person. Guests can enjoy signature dishes representing various Arab regions, live cooking stations, and international favorites. Peter Mansourian, General Manager of Grand Millennium Dubai, highlighted the restaurant’s reputation for exceptional cuisine, stating, “The Atrium enjoys the status of an exclusive restaurant for those willing to reward themselves with outstanding culinary fare as the outlet consistently delivers quality dishes in a familiar environment, with a team of dedicated staff to pamper and make you feel at home...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/grand-millennium-hotel-dubai-introduces-special-eid-packages/

item.title: W Retreat & Spa Bali - Seminyak is celebrating its fifth anniversary with a month-long celebration
item.description:
Source: W Retreat & Spa Bali website. The W Retreat & Spa Bali in Seminyak is celebrating its fifth anniversary on March 5, 2016. The resort will commemorate this milestone with a month-long celebration titled “FIVE ON FIVE,” showcasing five unique highlights. WOOBAR will present special edition Paletas Wey popsicles, a Mexican-style frozen treat crafted by the Bali-based company. Meanwhile, W THE STORE will offer an exclusive, limited-edition collection of “Wanitas” décor...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/w-retreat-spa-bali-seminyak-is-celebrating-its-fifth-anniversary-with-a-month-long-celebration/

item.title: Purify and detoxify on weekends in July and August at REVĪVŌ in Bali
item.description:
Source: REVĪVŌ. Throughout July and August, cleansing and detox retreats are offered every weekend. The luxurious REVĪVŌ wellness resort in Bali, Indonesia, has introduced weekend-long cleansing and detox retreats for July and August. Guests can choose to participate for one or two days. Kicking off at 10:00 am each Saturday, the program begins with a cold-pressed juice, followed by yoga, Pilates, or meditation. Afterward, attendees enjoy kombucha (a fermented tea beverage) and a detox lunch at the NŪTRIŌ restaurant...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/purify-and-detoxify-on-weekends-in-july-and-august-at-rev-v-in-bali/

item.title: Get away to The Meydan Hotel or Bab Al Shams Desert Resort & Spa this summer
item.description:
Source: Meydan Hotels & Hospitality website. Meydan Hotels & Hospitality is offering a summer promotion called “The Great Escape” for AED 490 per night at both Bab Al Shams Desert Resort & Spa and The Meydan Hotel until September 30, 2015. This offer is well-suited for short business trips. Located a 45-minute drive from the city, Bab Al Shams Desert Resort & Spa provides an authentic desert experience amidst the sand dunes...
